uk.gov.gchq.palisade.cache.service.heart

Class Stethoscope

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.palisade.cache.service.heart.Stethoscope

  • public class Stethoscope
extends java.lang.Object
    Monitors a list of currently alive instances for a given Service type by using the cache service to look for heartbeats from active instances.
    See Also:
    Heartbeat

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Stethoscope()
      Create an instance.

      • auscultate

        public java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> auscultate()
        Fetch a feed of active instances of the specific service type for this stethoscope.
        Returns:
        a stream of instance names
        API Note:
        To "auscultate" means to listen to the sound of the internal organs, usually for diagnosis.
